statements: SELECT city_name, energy_source, consumption_amount FROM energy_tracking WHERE measurement_date='2022-01-01';
SELECT energy_type, production_amount FROM energy_tracking WHERE city_name='New York' ORDER BY consumption_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_tracking WHERE energy_source='Solar' AND consumption_amount > 1000;
SELECT city_name, measurement_unit, measurement_date FROM energy_tracking WHERE energy_source='Wind' ORDER BY measurement_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT energy_source FROM energy_tracking ORDER BY energy_source;
SELECT city_name, energy_source, consumption_amount FROM energy_tracking WHERE measurement_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT city_name, energy_source, SUM(consumption_amount) AS total_consumption FROM energy_tracking GROUP BY city_name, energy_source
SELECT * FROM energy_tracking WHERE measurement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' AND energy_type = 'Renewable'
SELECT energy_source, SUM(production_amount) AS total_production FROM energy_tracking GROUP BY energy_source HAVING total_production > 1000
SELECT city_name, AVG(consumption_amount) AS avg_consumption FROM energy_tracking WHERE energy_type = 'Solar' GROUP BY city_name ORDER BY avg_consumption DESC
SELECT city_name, consumption_date, consumed_units FROM EnergyConsumption
SELECT consumed_units, city_name, consumption_date FROM EnergyConsumption
SELECT city_name, consumed_units, consumption_date FROM EnergyConsumption
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption
SELECT city_name, SUM(consumed_units) AS total_consumed_units FROM EnergyConsumption GROUP BY city_name LIMIT 5
SELECT city_name, consumption_date, consumed_units FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE city_name = 'New York' AND consumption_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT city_name, production_date, produced_units FROM EnergyProduction WHERE city_name = 'Los Angeles' ORDER BY production_date DESC
SELECT city_name, SUM(consumed_units) AS total_consumed_units FROM EnergyConsumption GROUP BY city_name HAVING total_consumed_units > 1000
SELECT city_name, COUNT(production_date) AS total_production_dates FROM EnergyProduction WHERE produced_units > 500 GROUP BY city_name ORDER BY total_production_dates DESC
SELECT city_name, production_date, produced_units FROM EnergyProduction WHERE production_date = '2022-11-25' AND produced_units < 3000
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption;
SELECT city_id, category FROM energy_production WHERE production_value > 1000;
SELECT city_name, population FROM city_information WHERE region = 'West';
SELECT city_id, production_source, production_value FROM energy_production ORDER BY production_value DESC;
SELECT city_id, category, consumption_value FROM energy_consumption WHERE city_id = 1;
SELECT city_name, population, region FROM city_information WHERE city_id = 1;
SELECT city_name, category, consumption_value FROM city_information, energy_consumption WHERE city_information.city_id = energy_consumption.city_id ORDER BY consumption_value DESC;
SELECT city_name, production_source, production_value FROM city_information, energy_production WHERE city_information.city_id = energy_production.city_id AND region = 'North';

SELECT city_name, category, consumption_value, production_source, production_value FROM city_information, energy_consumption, energy_production WHERE city_information.city_id = energy_consumption.city_id AND city_information.city_id = energy_production.city_id;
SELECT city_name, category, consumption_value FROM city_information, energy_consumption WHERE city_information.city_id = energy_consumption.city_id AND population > 100000 ORDER BY population ASC;
SELECT * FROM CityDetails;
SELECT city_name, region FROM CityDetails WHERE region = 'East';
SELECT city_name, consumption_amount FROM CityDetails JOIN EnergyConsumption ON CityDetails.city_id = EnergyConsumption.city_id;
SELECT trend_date, trend_type FROM EnergyTrends ORDER BY trend_date DESC;

SELECT city_name, consumption_amount, production_amount FROM CityDetails JOIN EnergyConsumption ON CityDetails.city_id = EnergyConsumption.city_id JOIN EnergyProduction ON CityDetails.city_id = EnergyProduction.city_id;
SELECT city_name, region FROM CityDetails ORDER BY city_name ASC;
SELECT city_name, region FROM CityDetails ORDER BY region DESC;
SELECT city_name, region FROM CityDetails WHERE region = 'East' AND city_name LIKE '%e%';
SELECT SUM(production_amount) AS total_production, SUM(consumption_amount) AS total_consumption FROM EnergyProduction JOIN EnergyConsumption ON EnergyProduction.city_id = EnergyConsumption.city_id;
SELECT city_name, trend_date, trend_type FROM CityDetails JOIN EnergyTrends ON CityDetails.city_id = EnergyTrends.city_id WHERE trend_type = 'Renewable' ORDER BY trend_date DESC;
SELECT city, year, monthly_consumption FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY city ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_production WHERE year = 2022;
SELECT city, building_name, building_type, total_energy_consumed FROM buildings WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM weather ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT source_name, energy_type, capacity FROM energy_sources WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT city, year, monthly_consumption FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY city, year DESC, monthly_consumption DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT city, year, monthly_consumption FROM energy_consumption WHERE year >= 2019 GROUP BY city, year HAVING SUM(monthly_consumption) > 10000;

SELECT ec.city, ec.year, ec.monthly_consumption, ep.monthly_production FROM energy_consumption ec JOIN energy_production ep ON ec.city = ep.city AND ec.year = ep.year WHERE ec.monthly_consumption > ep.monthly_production;
SELECT b.building_name, b.total_energy_consumed, e.city, e.temperature FROM buildings b JOIN energy_consumption e ON b.city = e.city;
SELECT es.source_name, es.energy_type, SUM(es.capacity) AS total_capacity FROM energy_sources es GROUP BY es.source_name, es.energy_type ORDER BY total_capacity DESC LIMIT 5;
